comment: Source: [Kaplan, Jed O., et al. 2023](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7511843). This is the input data for the `varlightning` sensitivity experiments. Seperate datasets are available for ssp126, ssp370, and ssp585. Please note, as this dataset is produced using UKESM output, modelers should only use this data together with UKESM climate forcing.
